name: 1 - No unbound pavement works shall commence until all relevant construction procedures have been accepted by the Administrator.
2 - The aggregate production procedures shall be submitted to the Administrator at least 7 days prior to commencement of material production
3 - The unbound pavement construction procedure shall be submitted to the Administrator at least 14 days prior to the commencement of unbound pavement works

4 - Copies of current paving material certificates (Type 1, 2 or 3) or quarry assessment (Type 4) forwarded to the Administrator at least 7 working days before material deliveries to the stockpile / pavement are to commence.
5 - Material from a quarry shall not be used until the quarry has been approved by the administrator.

6 - If more than one grading envelope is specified in Clause 2.1 of MRTS05.1 for a single location, the Contractor shall notifiy in writing, which of the grading envelopes will be used, at least two days prior to commencement
7 - Use of alternative grading envelope not used unless submitted and approved at least 2 days prior to delivery.

8 - Stockpiles located as specified in MRTS05.01 Cl. 6 or if not specified, on clear, even, firm, well drained ground where it can be clearly identified with individual stockpiles separated by at least 2m.
9 - Separate stockpiles for each production lot, or stockpiles incrementally created from a single material subtype with each added lot tested and approved prior to subsequent lots being added.
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
Client Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
